main_menu.title: Plant Farming Simulator
main_menu.instructions_text:
Instructions:
- Use arrow keys to move.
- Sow plants using the buttons.
- Reap plants when fully grown.
- Manage resources (sun/water).
- Reaping earns both produce and currency.
- Reach 50g of produce to win!
